## Client.stats() method

Perform a request to submit stats events to Doofinder.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
stats(eventName: string, params: GenericObject<string>): Promise<Response>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  eventName | <code>string</code> | Type of stats to send. |
|  params | <code>GenericObject&lt;string&gt;</code> | Parameters for the query string. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<Response>`

A promise to be fullfilled with the response or rejected with a `ClientResponseError`<!-- -->.
